comment._content: translation: Before the start, Seamus Elliot, Jean Stablinski and Jacques Anquetil under an umbrella

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Seamus Elliott (1934-1971), Irish cyclist: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seamus_Elliott Jean Stablinski (this spelling), aka Jean Stablewski (1932-2007), French cyclist of Polish ancestry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Stablinski Jacques Anquetil (1934-1987), French cyclist: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacques_Anquetil
